Body found on 90 Mile Beach, Far North, local iwi Te Aupōuri place rāhui on area https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/body-found-on-90-mile-beach-local-iwi-te-aupouri-place-rahui-on-area/FZK7UBEUIVCZDKWB32WH7FPXZA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/body-found-on-90-mile-beach-local-iwi-te-aupouri-place-rahui-on-area/FZK7UBEUIVCZDKWB32WH7FPXZA/ It comes after a diver went missing near Ahipara two days before Christmas. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 09:37:12 +0000 Local iwi Te Aupōuri placed a rāhui on 90 Mile Beach from Bluff to Scott’s Point today after a body washed ashore.

Firefighters have contained fires that broke out along railway line in Kirwee, Canterbury https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fires-throne-homes-along-railway-line-in-canterbury/PXD7MG4S7ZCNBN7MHLRU36G3HU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fires-throne-homes-along-railway-line-in-canterbury/PXD7MG4S7ZCNBN7MHLRU36G3HU/ There are no longer houses under immediate threat, Fenz says. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 05:12:19 +0000 Multiple vegetation fires believed to have been started by sparks from the brakes of a freight train were earlier threatening homes along a railway line near Kirwee, Canterbury.
Missing swimmer at Karioitahi Beach: Body found at Hamilton’s Gap north of Waiuku https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-swimmer-at-karioitahi-beach-body-found-at-hamiltons-gap-north-of-waiuku/Z6JQQ67F4VFQZLKQG6NLTAN2II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-swimmer-at-karioitahi-beach-body-found-at-hamiltons-gap-north-of-waiuku/Z6JQQ67F4VFQZLKQG6NLTAN2II/ Police believe the body is 19-year-old Hiran Joseph, who went missing on January 2. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 04:55:55 +0000 Land Search and Rescue and Surf Life Saving New Zealand have been scouring the area around Karioitahi Beach, on Auckland’s southwest coast as part of the search for a missing swimmer since January 2.
